title: Higher-Order Thinking Skill Enhancement Program for Language Subjects Using Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in using basic digital tools (word processors, presentation software)
context.additional_context: Conducted in BYOD environments, blended classes integrating digital tools into language analysis/creation activities

learning_goals: Students can produce logical writing outputs incorporating peer feedback using digital collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet).
Students can analyze linguistic patterns in literary works and present critical interpretations using text analysis software (WordCounter, Voyant Tools).
Students can design creative language expression outputs using digital storytelling tools (Canva, Adobe Spark).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
